attributes.action: Try and gret Facebook to change how we register
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Facebook needs to change how we register.With all the goings on thats on facebook now.Example  Dead baby jokes,people with fake profiles posting vile muck and pictures.When we register we need proof of identity because these people would not do it with real profiles.
Right now there is no way of finding out who these people with fake profiles are.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
